content.title: Aortic Stump Blowout
content.description: Catastrophic dehiscence of aortic stump after extra-anatomic bypass for infection

key_concepts.details: Aortic graft infection requiring excision, AEF, inadequate stump reinforcement
Monofilament suture closure, omental/prevertebral fascia coverage, tissue reinforcement
Sudden abdominal/back pain, hypotension, often rapidly fatal
Emergency exploration if viable; consider in situ reconstruction to avoid stump

content.statement: Aortic Stump Blowout is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Complications that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Aortic Stump Blowout helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Aortic Stump Blowout include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Aortic Stump Blowout.
